content.description: Start on high ledge, pull move into large flake and climb up.
content.location: Directly to the right of Bubbles.

content.description: Climb the finger crack that splits the face like an exponential decay function through a graph. Sit start low on the crack and finesse your way up with toe jams, gastons, and laybacks.
content.location: Just downhill from the Full Grain slab, but before Jump for Jesus. The crack can be seen by looking through the corridor between Jump for Jesus and the abutting boulder to the right.

content.description: A slab problem using the right arête of the Full Grain boulder.
content.location: Swade is located on the right side of the same boulder as Full Grain. Start and finish using the right arête.

content.description: Start on a side pull around head height, get a smear and pull up to a bad right hand side pull. Hand-foot match, and stand up.
content.location: The right side of the same slab the Stand Up to the Left is located. Also directly behind Have It.

content.description: For this problem you're going to start on the left bigger hueco on the big slab face. Once you have your hands in it, start traversing left and up to a committing last move.
content.location: This problem is directly up the hill to the left from the Full Grain boulder, and slightly to the right of the tree next to the boulder.

content.description: Start low, with right hand on the arête, left hand on anything you can grab. Stand up to a small left hand crimp, get a higher right foot and shoot for the lip.
content.location: Shoot from the Hip is located a couple boulders to the right of the problem Jump for Jesus. When heading that the direction, you'll come face to face with the slaby problem.

content.description: Same start as B-Cup, but go up to the pinch with your right hand instead. Use a toe hook to pull a rose move to the top.
Start sitting down, climb up on good holds.
content.location: To the right of Jump for Jesus

content.description: Begin a few feet to the right of the arete. Climb up the slab face using good feet and a crimp near the top. Arete is off.
content.location: Behind Have It and around the corner of Stand Up to the Right.

content.description: Climb the improbable, technical highball arete.
content.location: Northeast corner of the "Stand up for the Right Boulder."

content.description: Start in the middle left of the face, then work your way up and to the left to the arête using crimps.
content.location: Located on the opposite side of the Boulder as Stand up with the Left, in the corridor. The start is a little bit to the right of the arête.

content.description: A tall slab with a little dyno with decent holds.
content.location: To the right of Avant Gardener.

content.description: Start on two opposing crimpy side pulls, dyno to the lip and top out.
content.location: Downhill from Full Grain, right from Bill Cosby. On the far right side of the boulder's face.

content.description: You better keep your core tight if you want to finish this one. Have It starts with your left hand in a pocket and right on the arête. Work your way up the arête using smears and balance. The finish move is the crux.
content.location: Have It is located on the arête of the cliff cline up the hill from the Full Grain boulder.

content.description: Start towards the bottom left of the slab, hand(s) in a slopey dish. Continue straight up the slab until the crux at the lip, don't slip!
content.protection: A few pads and a spotter.
content.location: Downhill from the cliffline and trail between the Illuminati boulders and Vulture's nest area. Just uphill from Jump for Jesus.

content.description: Start low, with right hand at the end of the pockety feature, and left hand on pinch. Huck for the lip, then mantle.
content.location: A few feet directly to the right of Bourban Shooter.

content.description: Start low with left hand in a two finger pocket and right hand on a pinch. Huck to the lip and mantle.
content.location: The problem immiedtly to the right, around the arête, from Shoot at the Hip.

content.description: Start matched on the large hole, move out left to the arete, and top out.
content.location: Left side of the boulder that Jump for Jesus is on.

content.description: Climb up tall featured slab. The crux is at the beginning.
content.location: Avant Gardenor is on the right side of the same wall that Presto is on, but to the left of Lemon of Pink.

content.description: The slab along the arete to the left of Presto. This is also the (scary) downclimb for Presto.
A collection of boulders with a variety of different styles of problems, from a dyno to a fingercrack to slabs and more.
